TopicTitle: Kerbals no longer have lights built into their helmets?

Articles.Content: Just noticed this and I'm not sure if it's down to PEBKAC, but Kerbals no longer have lights in their helmets?  Pressing L doesn't do anything and clicking the 'Light' icon on the top toolbar does nothing either.  Was the feature removed?

They f-d up(yay filters) something in 1.1, it's laggy but it works, just keep spamming the button.

Edited August 28, 2016 by Leftotian

You're not the first person that has reported this but I've just tested and 'L' works fine.  It makes sense that the icon on the UI doesn't work as that's linked to 'U' for vehicle lights.
So, not a common problem but one that has affected other people.  You are not alone ^^.

ETA:  Might be useful to know which build number you have (bottom-right of the main menu screen)

Edited August 28, 2016 by Pecan

Version is 1.1.3.1289 (x64)
